Ma'ruf Amin Gelar Rapat Kabinet Perdana Bahas Stunting
01 Nov 2019, 07:49 by Egi Adyatama, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Wakil Presiden Ma'ruf Amin memimpin rapat terbatas tingkat menteri di Kantor Wakil Presiden, di Jalan Medan Merdeka Utara, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat, 1 November 2019. Ini merupakan rapat pertama yang dipimpin oleh Ma'ruf, sejak resmi menjabat sebagai wakil presiden pada 20 Oktober lalu.
Ma'ruf memimpin rapat penanggulangan kemiskinan dan penanganan stunting. "Stunting menjadi salah satu yang kita harus tindaklanjuti dan tanggulangi," ujar Ma'ruf saat membuka rapat.
Dari pantuan Tempo, menteri yang hadir adalah Menteri Agama Fachrul Razi, Menteri Dalam Negeri Tito Karnavian, Menteri Kesehatan Terawan Agus Putranto, Menteri Sosial Juliari Batubara, Menteri Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan Nadiem Makariem, juga Menteri Keungan Sri Mulyani.
Selain itu, hadir pula Menteri Koperasi, Usaha Kecil, dan Menengah (UMKM) Teten Masduki, Menteri Desa Pembangunan Tertinggal dan Transmigrasi Abdul Halim Iskandar, Kepala Bappenas Suharso Monoarfa, hingga Wakil Menteri PUPR Wempi Wetipo.
Pengentasan kemiskinan dan stunting merupakan program lanjutan yang terus digemborkan pemerintah. Pada era kepemimpinan Jokowi periode pertama, Tim Nasional Percepatan Penanggulangan Kemiskinan (TNP2K) dibentuk dan diketuai Wakil Presiden ke-12, Jusuf Kalla.
Sama halnya dengan JK, Ma'ruf juga sempat menyatakan fokusnya pada masalah kemiskinan dan stunting. Pada masa kampanye, Ma'ruf Amin sempat berjanji akan menurunkan angka stunting atau gagal tumbuh hingga 10 persen, jika terpilih.

Ma'ruf Amin Holds First Cabinet Meeting to Discuss Stunting
01 Nov 2019, 07:49 by Egi Adyatama, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Vice President Ma'ruf Amin has chaired a ministerial-level limited meeting at the Vice President's Office, on Jalan Medan Merdeka Utara, Central Jakarta, Friday, November 1, 2019. This is the first meeting chaired by Ma'ruf, since officially served as vice president on 20 October.
Ma'ruf chaired poverty reduction and stunting handling meetings. "Stunting is one that we must act on and overcome," Ma'ruf said when opening the meeting.
From Tempo's observation, the ministers present were Minister of Religion Fachrul Razi, Minister of Home Affairs Tito Karnavian, Minister of Health Terawan Agus Putranto, Minister of Social Affairs Juliari Batubara, Minister of Education and Culture Nadiem Makariem, also Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani.
In addition, present were Minister of Cooperatives, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME) Teten Masduki, Minister of Disadvantaged and Transmigration Development Village Abdul Halim Iskandar, Head of Bappenas Suharso Monoarfa, to Deputy Minister of PUPR Wempi Wetipo.
Poverty alleviation and stunting is an advanced program that continues to be heralded by the government. During the Jokowi's first era, the National Team for the Acceleration of Poverty Reduction (TNP2K) was formed and chaired by the 12th Vice President, Jusuf Kalla.
Similar to JK, Ma'ruf also briefly stated his focus on poverty and stunting. During the campaign period, Ma'ruf Amin had promised to reduce the number of stunting or fail to grow by 10 percent, if elected.
